name: medium_scrape_tag
description: Scrape a Medium tag page. Returns trending and recent articles for a given tag, along with related tags and writer recommendations.

steps.label: Wait for tag page to load

steps.code: const headingEl = document.querySelector('h1, h2[class*="tag"]'); const articles = []; const articleEls = document.querySelectorAll('article, [data-testid="postPreview"], div[class*="postArticle"]'); for (let i = 0; i < Math.min(articleEls.length, 15); i++) { const el = articleEls[i]; const titleEl = el.querySelector('h2, h3, [class*="title"]'); const authorEl = el.querySelector('a[data-testid="authorName"], a[rel="author"], [class*="author"] a'); const clapsEl = el.querySelector('[class*="clap"] span, button[data-testid="clap"] span'); const dateEl = el.querySelector('time, span[class*="date"]'); const readTimeEl = el.querySelector('[class*="readingTime"], span[class*="read-time"]'); const linkEl = el.querySelector('a[href*="/p/"], h2 a, h3 a'); const imgEl = el.querySelector('img[src*="miro.medium"], img[loading]'); articles.push({ title: titleEl ? titleEl.textContent.trim() : '', author: authorEl ? authorEl.textContent.trim() : '', claps: clapsEl ? clapsEl.textContent.trim() : '', date: dateEl ? (dateEl.getAttribute('datetime') || dateEl.textContent.trim()) : '', read_time: readTimeEl ? readTimeEl.textContent.trim() : '', url: linkEl ? linkEl.href : '', image: imgEl ? imgEl.getAttribute('src') : '' }); } const relatedTagEls = document.querySelectorAll('[class*="relatedTag"] a, [class*="related"] a[href*="/tag/"]'); const relatedTags = []; relatedTagEls.forEach(function(el) { const t = el.textContent.trim(); if (t && t.length < 50 && !relatedTags.includes(t)) relatedTags.push(t); }); return { tag: `{{tag}}`, heading: headingEl ? headingEl.textContent.trim() : '', article_count: articles.length, articles: articles, related_tags: relatedTags.slice(0, 10), url: window.location.href }
